Game information:  

Dead Rising 3 Apocalypse Edition includes the best game about zombies with
an open game world and the four sets of downloadable add-ons. Welcome to the
Apocalypse! Sharpen axes and shotguns charge - zombies are waiting!


Game Features:  

Welcome to Los Perdidos - ten years after the events in Fortune City you can
see the huge, open to moving, stunningly painted world town Los Perdidos,
hordes of zombies and mad plot. Thriller with the struggle for survival is
now unfolding on the screen - PC version is equipped with the full support
of Steam and gaming devices.

Zombies crawling out of the woodwork - their programmed behavior has become
more dangerous and smarter, and now they transmit information to each other,
so that the character will be able to save only a desperate agility and
resourcefulness.

Hundreds of homemade contraptions vehicles and weapons - the city is scattered
many components that can be improved and combined with each other, including
the terrible weapon Boom Cannon or trucks Party Slapper.

You can be afraid of it alone, but together you can - if you join forces and
make a marathon to exterminate the zombies, then dialed the experience points
will remain with you when you return to the game in single player mode.

Bonus downloadable content - now the set includes all four additions from the
series "The Untold Story Los Perdidosa." Each downloadable add their protagonist
and their crazy weapons and transport, which can be transferred to the main game.


RePack Features:  

Dead Rising 3 Apocalypse Edition
Game Version 1.0.0.5 Update 5
Do not cut / recoded
Choice of changing language in the game menu


Additions :  

Episode 1: Operation Broken Eagle
Episode 2: Fallen Angel
Episode 3: Chaos Rising
Episode 4: The Last Agent
